# Circle of Muting (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] 

**Level:** [[1st Level Adept Spells|Adept 1]], [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 1]], [[1st Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (a 3-ft.-diameter circle of powdered silver)

**Range:** Personal

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower website

This spell mutes the casting of other spells that are cast within it and prevents them from being detected at a distance on the Demiplane of Khemtia.
